title: Set Time of Day (TOD)
description: SET_TOD calculates a time of day (TOD) from the input vaï¿¾lues, hours, minutes and seconds.
name: SET_TOD

input.name: hour
input.description: The hour component of the time, ranging from 0 to 23.

input.name: minute
input.description: The minute component of the time, ranging from 0 to 59.

input.name: second
input.description: The second component of the time, which can include a fractional part for milliseconds.

return_value.description: Returns the time of day value calculated from the input parameters.
